UI Design for Sailor App

Rebranding with new icons and updated design

CLIENT Sailor App - Australia

THE CHALLENGE

Come up with new icons accoridng to the brand guidelines and update the design for exisitng screens for iOS

THE BRIEF

The client had the wireframes for redesign of some screens for their iOS app. The client also shared a brief to come up with icons to be used for their project.

The iOS application aims to provide information about various events related clubbing and sailing activities to budding adventurers. As part of the project, I was required to design icons for various events and three screens namely - Member List, Member Details and an Event Screen.
